translations: [毒物]毒素，毒质；毒素类（toxin 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Toxins can leak from the gut into the bloodstream.
sentences.translation: 毒素能够从肠道渗透到血液里。

sentences.sentence: The problem was that the exhaust gases contain many toxins.
sentences.translation: 问题是废气含有很多毒素。

sentences.sentence: Drinking lots of water will help to flush toxins out of the body.
sentences.translation: 大量饮水有助于清除体内毒素。
